description: This table holds the coverage level custom attribute values.

columns.name: CVG_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the coverage record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: CUST_ATTR_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description:
Custom attribute value type indicator.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 No Entries Defined

columns.name: CUST_ATTR_DT1_DT
columns.description: First date value for the custom attribute.

columns.name: CUST_ATTR_DT2_DT
columns.description: Second date value for the custom attribute.

columns.name: CUST_ATTR_CD1_C_NAME
columns.description:
First coded category value for the custom attribute.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 No Entries Defined

columns.name: CUST_ATTR_CD2_C_NAME
columns.description:
Second coded category value for the custom attribute.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: CUST_ATTR_CD1_C_NAME

columns.name: CUST_ATTR_TXT1
columns.description: First free-text value for the custom attribute.

columns.name: CUST_ATTR_TXT2
columns.description: Second free-text value for the custom attribute.

columns.name: CUST_ATTR_NUM1
columns.description: First numeric value for the custom attribute.

columns.name: CUST_ATTR_NUM2
columns.description: Second numeric value for the custom attribute.
